data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated February 12 2026.
data.news_body: Outcome of Board meeting Date 12.02.2026

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated February 12 2026.
data.news_body: Outcome of Board meeting Date 12.02.2026

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated February 12 2026
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. February 12 2026 has inter alia considered and approved the following items of business:

i. The Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended December 31 2025 along with the Limited Review report as on that date.

In furtherance the intimation filed by the Company regarding the Trading Window for trading in securities of the Company by insiders was closed on January 1 2026 and shall be opened after 48 hours from the declaration of Financial Results i.e. on February 14 2026.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Notice Of The Board Meeting Scheduled To Be Held On Thursday February 12 2026.
data.news_body:
Euro Panel Products Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve  Pursuant to the Regulations 29 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday February 12 2026 to consider approve and take on record inter alia the following:
i. The Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended December 31 2025 along with the Limited Review report as on that date.
ii. Any other Business as may be decided with the permission of the Chair.
Further as per the provisions of the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and in accordance with the Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading adopted by the
Company the Trading Window for trading in the securities of the Company by any Insider covered under the said Code was closed on January 1 2026 till 48 hours from the publication of financial results.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. January 06 2026. has inter alia considered and approved the following items of business:

Grant of Loan of QAR 500000 to Wholly Owned Subsidiary in Qatar

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Notice Of The Board Meeting Scheduled To Be Held On Tuesday November 11 2025
data.news_body:
Euro Panel Products Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 11/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to the Regulations 29 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday November 11 2025 to consider approve and take on record inter alia the following: 
i. The Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and Half year ended September 30 2025 along with the Limited Review report as on that date.
ii. Any other Business as may be decided with the permission of the Chair.  
Further as per the provisions of the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and in accordance with the Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading adopted by the 
Company the Trading Window for trading in the securities of the Company by any Insider covered under the said Code was closed on October 1 2025 till 48 hours from the publication of financial results.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Notice Of The Board Meeting Scheduled To Be Held On Thursday August 14 2025.
data.news_body:
Euro Panel Products Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to the Regulations 29 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday August 14 2025 to consider approve and take on record inter alia the following: 
i. The Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30 2025. 
ii. Any other Business as may be decided by the Board of Directors.  

Further as per the provisions of the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and in accordance with the Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading adopted by the 
Company the Trading Window for trading in the securities of the Company by any Insider covered under the said Code was closed on July 1st 2025 and shall be opened on August 16 
2025.

data.news_body: Euro Panel  Products Limited becomes the first Indian ACP Company to list BSE and NSE

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Euro Panel Products Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 01 2025 the equity shares of Euro Panel Products Ltd (Scrip Code: 544461) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250731-25 dated July 31 2025.
